patterns: A very good morning to you
responses: Hello, welcome to HotelBot! How can I assist you today?
Hi! I'm HotelBot. How may I help you with your hotel stay?
Goodbye! Have a wonderful stay, and we hope to see you again soon!
See you later! Don't hesitate to contact us if you need anything during your stay.

patterns: What types of rooms do you have?
responses: We offer various room types including Standard, Deluxe, Suite, and Executive rooms. Would you like details about a specific room type?
Our hotel features Standard rooms, Deluxe rooms with ocean views, and luxurious Suites. Which type interests you?

patterns: What are your front desk hours?
What time does the front desk close?
responses: Our front desk is open 24/7 to serve you. Check-in is available anytime after 3 PM.
We have 24-hour reception service. You can check in anytime after 3 PM and check out by 11 AM.

patterns: Do you have any special offers?
Tell me about your special deals
responses: We currently have a 20% discount for extended stays of 5 nights or more!
We're offering a complimentary breakfast package with all suite bookings this month.

patterns: I want to book a room
Do I need to book in advance?
How can I book a room?
responses: Yes! You can book a room through our website or by contacting our reservations team. Would you like me to assist you with booking?
I can help you with that! Please let me know your check-in/check-out dates and room preference.

patterns: What are your room service hours?
Can I order food to my room?
responses: Yes, we offer 24-hour room service with a full menu available.
Room service is available around the clock. A menu is provided in your room.

patterns: What facilities does the hotel have?
responses: Our hotel features a swimming pool, fitness center, spa, business center, and complimentary WiFi throughout the property.
Guests enjoy access to our pool, gym, spa services, and 24-hour business facilities. We also offer concierge services.

patterns: How do I get to your hotel?
responses: We are located at 123 Hospitality Avenue, Downtown City. Would you like directions?
You can find us at 123 Hospitality Avenue, Downtown City. Let me know if you need transportation assistance!

patterns: How can I contact the hotel?
How can I reach the front desk?
responses: You can reach us at [Click here](https://wa.me/2349077332016) or email us at info@hotel.com.
Feel free to call us at [Click here](https://wa.me/2349077332016) for any inquiries!

patterns: I want to review my stay
How can I share my experience?
responses: We'd love to hear your feedback! You can share it with us directly at the front desk or leave a review on our website.
We value your opinion! Please feel free to share your experience with us through our guest survey.
You're very welcome! We're happy to serve you.
It's our pleasure! Let us know if you need anything else.
Standard check-in time is 3 PM. Early check-in may be available depending on room availability for a small fee.
Check-in begins at 3 PM. We're happy to store your luggage if you arrive earlier.

patterns: When do I need to check out?
Can I have a late check-out?
responses: Check-out time is 11 AM. Late check-out may be available upon request and subject to availability.
Standard check-out is at 11 AM. For late check-out options, please inquire at the front desk.
We offer both valet parking and self-parking options. Valet is 3000/night while self-parking is 2000/night.
Yes, we have parking available. We offer complimentary parking for hotel guests.
We offer a complimentary breakfast buffet daily from 6:30 AM to 10:30 AM in our dining room.
Breakfast is served from 6:30 AM to 10:30 AM. We have both continental and hot breakfast options available.
We are pet-friendly! Pets up to 50 lbs are welcome for a $50 cleaning fee per stay.
Yes, we welcome pets with some restrictions. There's a small additional fee and we ask that pets not be left unattended.
Yes, we offer complimentary high-speed WiFi throughout the hotel. The network is 'HotelGuest' and the password is 'Welcome123'.
Free WiFi is available for all guests. You'll find login instructions in your room.
Our 24-hour fitness center is equipped with cardio machines, free weights, and yoga mats.
The fitness center is open 24 hours and features modern equipment for your workout needs.

patterns: Do you have a swimming pool?
responses: We have an indoor heated pool open from 6 AM to 10 PM daily. Children are welcome with adult supervision.
Our outdoor pool is open seasonally from 8 AM to 8 PM and is heated for comfortable swimming.

patterns: What spa services do you offer?
responses: Our full-service spa offers massages, facials, and body treatments. It's open daily from 9 AM to 8 PM.
Yes, we have an on-site spa. Services include massages, facials, and manicures/pedicures. Appointments are recommended.

patterns: Do you have a business center?
responses: Our business center is open 24/7 and offers computers, printers, and copying services. Meeting rooms are available for rent.
Yes, we have a fully equipped business center with printing, scanning, and fax services available to guests.

patterns: Can I get my clothes cleaned?
responses: We offer both self-service laundry facilities and full laundry/dry cleaning services with next-day return.
Yes, we have coin-operated laundry machines on each floor and also offer valet laundry service.

patterns: What accessibility features do you have?
Are there rooms for disabled guests?
responses: Yes, our hotel is fully ADA compliant with wheelchair accessible rooms, elevators, and public areas.
We have several accessible rooms with roll-in showers and other ADA features. Please request when booking.

patterns: Can I smoke in my room?
responses: Our hotel is 100% non-smoking. A $250 cleaning fee will be charged for smoking in rooms.
For the comfort of all guests, smoking is not permitted anywhere in the hotel. Designated smoking areas are available outside.

patterns: Is there a penalty for cancelling?
How do I cancel my booking?
responses: Cancellations made 48 hours or more before arrival incur no penalty. Later cancellations are charged one night's stay.
You can cancel your reservation without penalty up to 2 days before your scheduled arrival.

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
Can I pay with credit card?
responses: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Discover), cash, and traveler's checks.
Payment can be made with credit/debit cards, cash, or mobile payments like Apple Pay and Google Pay.

patterns: What can I do in the area?
responses: We're located near several museums, shopping districts, and excellent restaurants. Our concierge can provide recommendations!
Popular nearby attractions include City Park (5 min walk), the Art Museum (10 min drive), and many great dining options.

patterns: How can I get to the airport?
responses: We offer complimentary airport shuttle service running every 30 minutes. The front desk can also arrange taxis or car rentals.
Our concierge can help arrange transportation including airport shuttles, taxis, and rental cars.

patterns: What's your policy for large groups?
responses: Yes, we offer special rates for group bookings of 10 rooms or more. Please contact our group sales department.
We welcome group bookings and can offer discounted rates for blocks of rooms. Let me connect you with our group coordinator.

patterns: Do you offer extended stay rates?
Do you have specials for long stays?
Can I stay for several weeks?
responses: We offer discounted rates for stays of 7 nights or longer. Please inquire about our extended stay packages.
Yes, we have special rates and amenities for extended stays. Our front desk can provide details.

patterns: Can I see the room service menu?
What food can I order to my room?
Do you have a room service menu?
responses: The room service menu is available in your room and includes breakfast, lunch, and dinner options available 24/7.
Our room service offers a variety of dishes from our restaurant menu. A menu is provided in each guest room.

patterns: Is there food available late at night?
Can I get food after midnight?
What are your late night dining options?
responses: Our restaurant closes at 11 PM, but room service is available 24 hours with a limited late-night menu.
For late-night dining, we offer a limited room service menu available all night, or there are several 24-hour delivery options nearby.

patterns: Can I leave my bags after check-out?
Is there somewhere to keep my luggage?
responses: Yes, we offer complimentary luggage storage before check-in and after check-out at the bell desk.
We're happy to store your luggage for you before your room is ready or after you've checked out.

patterns: What if I get there before check-in?
Can I get into my room early?
responses: While we can't guarantee early check-in, we'll do our best to accommodate you. We're happy to store your luggage until your room is ready.
Early check-in is subject to availability. Please call ahead on your arrival day to check if your room will be ready early.

patterns: How can I get a better room?
responses: Room upgrades are available based on availability and for an additional fee. Please inquire at the front desk about current upgrade options.
We'd be happy to discuss upgrade possibilities! Available upgrades may include larger rooms, better views, or suite accommodations.

patterns: Is there a minibar in the room?
responses: All our rooms feature a minibar with snacks and beverages. These items are available for purchase and will be charged to your room.
The minibar is stocked with drinks and snacks which are available for purchase. If you need it restocked during your stay, please contact housekeeping.

patterns: How do I request room cleaning?
responses: Daily housekeeping service is provided between 9 AM and 5 PM. For extra towels or special requests, please contact the front desk.
We offer daily turndown service. If you'd like additional housekeeping service or need anything, just dial '0' from your room phone.

patterns: Can I control the room temperature?
responses: Each room has an individual climate control system. If you're having trouble adjusting it, our maintenance team can assist you.
You can adjust your room's temperature using the thermostat on the wall. If you need help, please call the front desk.

patterns: Is there a safe in the room?
How do I use the room safe?
Can I store valuables at the front desk?
Do you have safety deposit boxes?
responses: Each room is equipped with an electronic safe for your valuables. Instructions for use are provided in your room.
We have in-room safes and also offer safety deposit boxes at the front desk for additional security.

patterns: Where should I eat around here?
Best places to eat near the hotel?
responses: Our concierge would be happy to recommend restaurants based on your preferences. We have excellent options within walking distance!
There are many great dining options nearby ranging from casual to fine dining. Check out our neighborhood guide at the front desk.

patterns: What services does the concierge offer?
Can the concierge help with tickets?
How do I contact the concierge?
responses: Our concierge can assist with restaurant reservations, event tickets, transportation, tours, and local recommendations. They're available at the front desk.
The concierge service can help plan your activities, make reservations, and provide local insights. Just visit them in the lobby!

patterns: Can I get a late checkout?
How late can I check out?
Can I extend my checkout time?
responses: Late checkout is available upon request and subject to availability. There may be an additional fee for late checkouts after 1 PM.
We can often accommodate late checkout requests. Please check with the front desk the day before your departure about availability.

patterns: How can I see my bill?
Can I get a copy of my invoice?
Where can I check my charges?
How do I review my hotel bill?
responses: You can view your current charges on the in-room TV system or request a printout at the front desk at any time.
Your folio is available at the front desk 24/7. You can also access it through our guest portal on your mobile device.

patterns: What if I damage something in the room?
What's your policy on broken items?
Will I be charged for room damage?
What happens if I spill something?
responses: Accidents happen! Please report any damage immediately so we can assess the situation. Minor accidents typically don't incur charges.
We understand accidents occur. Please notify us right away about any damage so we can address it appropriately.

patterns: What do I do in an emergency?
responses: In case of emergency, dial '0' from your room phone or use the emergency call buttons located throughout the hotel.
Emergency exits are clearly marked on the back of your room door and throughout hallways. For emergencies, dial '0' immediately.

patterns: I left something in my room
How do I check for lost items?
responses: Our lost and found department keeps items for 30 days. Please contact the front desk with a description of your lost item.
If you've left something behind, call our lost and found department at extension 55. We'll do our best to locate your item.

patterns: Can I make a special request?
responses: We're happy to accommodate special requests when possible. Please let us know your needs when booking or contact the front desk.
Our staff will do their best to fulfill special requests. Please provide details to our reservations team or front desk.
We offer several romantic packages including champagne, flowers, and special turndown service. Contact our concierge for details!
Our romance packages feature special amenities to make your stay memorable. Ask about our honeymoon and anniversary specials.

patterns: What business amenities do you offer?
Can I host a business meeting?
responses: We offer full business services including meeting rooms, video conferencing, printing, and secretarial services upon request.
Business travelers enjoy our workstations, high-speed internet, and meeting facilities. Ask about our corporate rates.

patterns: Can I host an event at your hotel?
What size events can you host?
responses: We have beautiful event spaces for groups from 10 to 300 people. Our events team would love to discuss your needs!
Yes! We specialize in weddings, corporate events, and social gatherings. Contact our events department for packages.

patterns: Do you have a gift shop?
Is there a shop in the hotel?
responses: Our gift shop is located in the lobby and offers souvenirs, snacks, toiletries, and local products. Open daily 7 AM-10 PM.
The hotel gift shop carries essentials you may have forgotten as well as unique local gifts. It's next to the front desk.

patterns: How do I get around town?
What's the best way to explore the city?
Do you offer transportation to attractions?
Can you call me a taxi?
responses: Our concierge can arrange taxis, rental cars, or provide information about public transportation. We also offer a complimentary downtown shuttle.
For local transportation, we recommend rideshares, taxis, or our free area shuttle. The concierge can help arrange whatever you need.

patterns: I'm not happy with my room
I need to speak to a manager
responses: We're sorry to hear you're not completely satisfied. Please let us know how we can improve your stay - the front desk manager is available to assist.
Your satisfaction is important to us. Please share your concerns with our guest services team so we can address them immediately.
Thank you for your kind words! We're delighted you're enjoying your stay. Please let us know if there's anything we can do to make it even better.
We're so happy to hear you're having a great experience! Your feedback means the world to our team.

patterns: Do you have a loyalty program?
How do I join your rewards?
What are the benefits of membership?
Can I earn points for my stay?
responses: Yes! Our loyalty program offers room upgrades, late checkouts, and points redeemable for free nights. Sign up at the front desk or online.
Join our loyalty program to enjoy exclusive benefits including member-only rates, complimentary amenities, and points toward free stays.

patterns: Can I get a company discount?
responses: We offer special corporate rates for business travelers. Please inquire at the front desk about our business programs.
Many companies have negotiated rates with us. Have your corporate ID ready when booking or checking in.

patterns: Is there a discount for veterans?
Do you honor armed forces discounts?
responses: We're proud to offer special rates for active military and veterans with valid ID. Please present your ID at check-in.
Yes, we provide a 10% discount for active duty military and veterans. Thank you for your service!

patterns: Is there a rate for seniors?
responses: We offer a 10% discount for guests 65+. Please mention this when booking or present ID at check-in.
Yes, seniors enjoy special rates. Ask about our senior discount when making your reservation.

patterns: Do you accept government travel cards?
Is there a discount for federal employees?
responses: We offer government rates for official travel. Please present your government ID and travel orders at check-in.
Yes, we honor government per diem rates when rooms are available for official travel.

patterns: Is it cheaper to stay by the week?
responses: We offer discounted weekly and monthly rates for extended stays. Please contact our reservations team for details.
Yes! Stays of 7+ nights qualify for our extended stay discount. The longer you stay, the more you save.

patterns: Do you have last minute specials?
Can I get a discount for booking last minute?
responses: We sometimes offer last-minute discounts when we have availability. Call the front desk to check current promotions.
Ask about our 'Tonight Only' specials when calling or checking in - we often have great last-minute deals!
We have several packages combining accommodations with dining credits, spa services, or local attractions. Check our website for current offers.
Our packages make your stay extra special! Options include romance, family, and adventure packages with added amenities.

patterns: Is there a room service fee?
How much does room service cost?
Is there a delivery charge for room service?
What's the service charge for in-room dining?
responses: Room service orders include a 18% service charge and $5 delivery fee. Gratuity is at your discretion beyond this.
There's a small delivery fee and service charge for room service. The exact amount will be noted on your menu.

patterns: What's included in the resort fee?
Can I opt out of the resort fee?
How much is the daily resort charge?
responses: Our $25 daily resort fee includes WiFi, pool access, fitness center, and local calls. This is automatically added to all reservations.
The resort fee covers many amenities you'll enjoy during your stay. Unfortunately it's mandatory for all guests.

patterns: Why was my card charged at check-in?
How much do you hold for incidentals?
When will I get my deposit back?
responses: We place a $50/night hold on your card for incidentals. This temporary hold will be released after check-out if no charges are made.
The incidental hold covers potential room charges and is typically released within 3-5 business days after checkout.

patterns: What if I need to leave early?
Is there a penalty for checking out early?
Can I change my checkout date?
responses: Early departures may be subject to a fee depending on your rate plan. Please notify the front desk as soon as possible.
We understand plans change. Please let us know at least 24 hours in advance to avoid early departure fees.

patterns: What happens if I don't show up?
Will I be charged if I don't arrive?
responses: No-shows are typically charged one night's room and tax. Please cancel by 4 PM the day before arrival to avoid this charge.
Our cancellation policy requires notice by 4 PM the day prior to avoid a no-show charge equal to one night's stay.

patterns: Do you have wheelchairs for guest use?
responses: We have a limited number of wheelchairs available for guest use at no charge. Please contact the front desk to reserve one.
Complimentary wheelchairs are available on a first-come, first-served basis. Ask at reception for availability.

patterns: Can I find a babysitter through the hotel?
responses: We can arrange licensed babysitting services with 24 hours notice. Rates start at $25/hour. Contact the concierge to arrange.
While we don't have on-site childcare, our concierge can recommend trusted local babysitting services.

patterns: Can you recommend a dog walker?
Where can I take my dog nearby?
responses: We partner with a local pet care service that offers walking, sitting, and grooming. The concierge can provide contact information.
Pet relief areas are located behind the hotel, and we have a list of nearby dog parks and pet services at the front desk.

patterns: Is there a doctor on call?
Can you help with medical emergencies?
Do you have first aid supplies?
responses: We have a doctor on call 24/7 and can arrange medical assistance if needed. For emergencies, dial '0' immediately.
First aid kits are available at the front desk. The nearest 24-hour pharmacy is two blocks away on Main Street.

patterns: What are your laundry service hours?
Can I get clothes pressed quickly?
responses: We offer same-day dry cleaning for items received before 9 AM. Express pressing service is available within 2 hours.
Laundry received by 10 AM will be returned by 5 PM the same day. We also have self-service laundry machines on the 3rd floor.

patterns: Can I get a morning paper?
responses: Complimentary newspapers are available in the lobby each morning. We offer the Times, Journal, and local paper.
You can request a specific newspaper delivered to your room each morning. Just let the front desk know your preference.

patterns: Can you help me find religious services?
What time are local services held?
responses: Our concierge has information on all local places of worship and their service times. We're happy to provide directions.
We have a directory of nearby religious institutions at the front desk. Many are within walking distance.

patterns: Do you have staff who speak [language]?
responses: We have multilingual staff available during peak hours. For translation needs, we can arrange professional services with advance notice.
Several of our team members speak multiple languages. Let us know your language needs and we'll do our best to assist.

patterns: What type of outlets are in the rooms?
Do I need a power adapter?
How many outlets are in the room?
responses: Our rooms feature both standard 110V outlets and USB charging ports at each bedside and work desk.
You'll find multiple outlets throughout the room, including international adapters available for loan at the front desk.
We provide complimentary toiletries, bottled water, coffee/tea, WiFi, and access to all hotel facilities.
Enjoy our free amenities including premium toiletries, morning newspaper, gym access, and 24-hour coffee service in the lobby.
